title: Increase APR
body:
Increase APR for stakers that are already staking for more then 30 days and are going to stake for at least another 30 days.
-First 30 days: 88,88%
-Second 30 days(locked): 888,8%
-Third 30 days: choice between (1)regular 88,88% or (2)60 days lock for 888,8%
After which if choice (1) back to First 30 days, or if choice (2) back to Second 30 days.
author: 0x3d2b6eacD1Bca51Af57eD8B3FF9EF0bd8Ee8C56D
